basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Ralph H. and Jessie M. Mengel Scholarship

description: The Dr. Ralph H. and Jessie M. Mengel Endowed Scholarship is open to full-time students with a declared Management (Management, Human Resource Management, or PGA Golf Management) major. Eligibility Requirements 45 or more credit hours completed at the time of the application Minimum 3.5 cumulative GPA, and completion of all courses during the previous semester Students who graduate in Fall 2024 or prior are not eligible to apply One faculty recommendation is required (please indicate the College of Business faculty member on your application that you wish to supply a recommendation).

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
